Title: Establishes Eid-al-Adha and Eid-al-Fitr as school holidays in public school districts
Summary: Establishes Eid-al-Adha and Eid-Al-Fitr as school holidays in certain school districts.
LawCode: Add ยง3204-a, amd ยง3604, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing Eid-al-Adha and Eid-al-Fitr as school holidays
